ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:47:44 [Issue ID 4000-44103] urn:comicvine:4000-44103 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev78 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-07 19:33:33. [Issue ID 44103]
ComicInfo.Summary: Katchoo falls. Falls a single floor onto a wider balcony below and lands at Darcy's feet. Darcy reveals that Rachael was in fact Veronica. Francine is frantic that Katchoo failed to ring home last night as promised. She becomes so worried she breaks out the dossier Walsh gave to Katchoo and sees the photographs for the first time and sees what kind of things Katchoo did while working for Darcy. She goes to Walsh with the suspicion that Darcy has kidnapped Katchoo or something worse. David is surprised to come down to breakfast with Darcy and Katchoo.
ComicInfo.Title: The Loneliness of Madmen
